# cliproxyapi++ ðŸš€

> Unified Agent Orchestration, Governance, and Lifecycle Management.

## Overview
cliproxyapi++ is a high-performance, hardened fork of CLIProxyAPI. It provides an OpenAI-compatible interface for third-party LLM providers (Claude, Gemini, Codex, Kiro, etc.) with integrated auth management and rate limiting.

## Key Files
- `cmd/server/main.go`: Application entry point and flag definitions.
- `pkg/llmproxy/config/config.go`: Configuration structures and loading logic.
- `sdk/cliproxy/service.go`: Core service implementation.
- `sdk/cliproxy/auth/conductor.go`: Authentication management.
- `config.example.yaml`: Main configuration template.

## Authentication Support
- Kiro (AWS CodeWhisperer) OAuth & Device Flow
- GitHub Copilot OAuth
- Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, and many others via API keys.

## Deployment
- Recommended: Docker Compose (`docker-compose.yml`)
- Binary: `cliproxyapi++`

## Agent Guidelines
- Use the OpenAI-compatible endpoints: `/v1/chat/completions`, `/v1/models`.
- Kiro Auth UI: `/v0/oauth/kiro`.
- Manage configurations in `config.yaml`.
- Logs are stored in `./logs/`.

For full details, see [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt).
